definition: to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall

sentences.english: Performance track and performace result application must be proceeding.
sentences.chinese: 進行績效追蹤與績效結果應用。

sentences.english: There was no recurrence after six months of follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 術後經六個月追蹤沒有復發的情形。

sentences.english: Prepare the inspection report for NPI model, and tracking if can be closed.
sentences.chinese: 新機種檢驗報告製作，問題點改善追蹤。

sentences.english: Zoltan gave me enough information for me to track down his address.
sentences.chinese: 佐爾坦給了我足夠的資料，我追蹤他的地址。

sentences.english: SpendingPulse tracks all forms of spending, including cash.
sentences.chinese: 消費脈動追蹤所有消費的形式，包括現金。

sentences.english: Tracks yearly vacation, overtime compensation, sick leave and other leave information.
sentences.chinese: 管理和追蹤年假，調休，病假和其他假期信息。

sentences.english: The chart below tracks the number of terrorist-related fatalities worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 下表追蹤了世界範圍內與恐怖主義相關的死亡人數。

sentences.english: You know there are many people tracking each and every move of Nokia.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，許多人追蹤着諾基亞的一舉一動。

sentences.english: Logistics management intelligent anti-counterfeiting: full track on production line, ensuring product quality.
sentences.chinese: 可在生產線全程追蹤，確保產品品質。

sentences.english: They offer unlimited ad tracking and auto responders.
sentences.chinese: 它們提供無限專案追蹤和自動應答。

sentences.english: NASA followed Stevie’s progress with interest.
sentences.chinese: 國家航空總署饒有興趣地追蹤着史蒂夫此事的進展。

sentences.english: The perpetrator was tracked to Germany, where he was sentenced a year later.
sentences.chinese: 作惡者被追蹤到德國，一年以後，在那接受審判。

sentences.english: Princess of Planet Ozma, Lala, entered the earth when pursuing a virus named Guli.
sentences.chinese: 奧茨瑪公主啦啦追蹤病毒古力進入地球。

sentences.english: Post-operative 30-month follow up showed no local recurrence of the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 手術後30個月追蹤並無腫瘤復發之跡象。

sentences.english: They don't trust many to be trackers. Or to be apprentices.
sentences.chinese: 他們不信任很多人去做追蹤者，或者是做一個徒弟。

sentences.english: She and a small group of her followers pursued Illidan through the portal.
sentences.chinese: 她和一小部分追隨者追蹤伊利丹越過了傳送門。

definition: to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking

to lock (a door)/to close with a latch/to lock into place/a lock/a latch/to lock a computer file (to prevent it being overwritten)/to lock (denying access to a computer system or device or files, e.g. by password-protection)/to focus attention on/to target
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
